TextView.android:text: Passive: At the beginning of each round, the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy ability, up to 600 damage.

Passive: Dealing magic or true damage with an ability applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grevious Wounds for the duration
Passive: Every 5 seconds, the wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 18% missing health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds.

Passive: At start of combat, and every 2 seconds thereafter, applies a 8-second burn to a random enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration.
Wearer regenerates 6% missing Health per second.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 30% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.
Passive: At the start of combat, Stasis banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board. Pierces through CC immunity effects.
Passive: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the wearer dies, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Summoned units can spawn Voidspawns at 25% effectiveness.
